title: Welcome to the Bitshares Beet Airdrop tool!
desc: The following features are available for the Bitshares blockchains!
footer: To make full use of the feature set available in this tool, the Bitshares BEET multiwallet is required.

ticketAnalysis.title: Ticket data analysis
ticketAnalysis.desc: Analyze the contents of voting tickets

airdropCalc.title: Airdrop calculation
airdropCalc.desc: Create airdrop vectors with provably random blockchain based inputs

airdropAnalysis.title: Calculated airdrop analysis
airdropAnalysis.desc: Verify the contents of calculated airdrops prior to execution on the blockchain

airdropExecute.title: Airdrop execution
airdropExecute.desc: Perform token airdrops on the blockchain

createTicket.title: Ticket creation
createTicket.desc: Lock tokens to vote and get airdrops

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.desc: Learn more about airdrops, tickets and blockchains
